instructions.name: head1
instructions.content: A semi-opaque volume rendering of the brain to visualize tumors in relation to surrounding tissues from various angles.

instructions.name: head2
instructions.content: A high-contrast volume rendering of the paranasal sinuses to clearly visualize the extent of sinusitis.

instructions.name: head3
instructions.content: A fully opaque volume rendering of cerebral vasculature to assess stenosis and aneurysms with clear differentiation between arterial and venous structures.

instructions.name: head4
instructions.content: A high-contrast volume rendering focusing on the skull with fully opaque bones and transparent soft tissues to highlight potential fracture lines from multiple angles.

instructions.name: head5
instructions.content: A fully opaque volume rendering of dental structures to assess for caries or abnormalities, with clear differentiation of affected areas.

instructions.name: head6
instructions.content: A CT scan of head with highlight on skull.

instructions.name: head7
instructions.content: A human head with semi-opaque outline, green skull and red teeth.

instructions.name: head8
instructions.content: Photorealistic head anatomy.

instructions.name: head9
instructions.content: A clear image of an Opaque face with skin eyes nose and lips.

instructions.name: head10
instructions.content: A human head with yellow skull, blue teeth and semi-opaque face.

instructions.name: head11
instructions.content: "Attack on Titan" style.

instructions.name: head12
instructions.content: I need a medical education-style rendering that precisely separates and highlights informations about the human head anatomy.

instructions.name: head13
instructions.content: Realistic head anatomy with full-opque silver skull, white teeth, and semi-opaque skin.

instructions.name: head14
instructions.content: Realistic head anatomy with full-opque metal skull, red teeth, and semi-opaque skin.

instructions.name: head15
instructions.content: Realistic head anatomy with full-opqaue brain tissues, red blood vessels, opaque white bone and green face outline.

instructions.name: chest1
instructions.content: A high-contrast volume rendering of the liver to clearly visualize lesions in relation to surrounding tissues from various angles.

instructions.name: chest2
instructions.content: A semi-opaque volume rendering of the lungs to assess for pulmonary nodules and masses with clear differentiation from surrounding structures.

instructions.name: chest3
instructions.content: A fully opaque volume rendering of the heart and major vessels to assess for coronary artery disease and structural abnormalities with clear visualization of blood flow.

instructions.name: chest4
instructions.content: A high-contrast volume rendering focusing on the thoracic spine with fully opaque bones and transparent soft tissues to assess for fractures or degenerative changes.

instructions.name: chest5
instructions.content: A fully opaque volume rendering of the chest wall to assess for rib fractures or soft tissue injuries with clear visualization of underlying structures.

instructions.name: chest6
instructions.content: Chest with semi-opaque outline and realistic bones.

instructions.name: chest7
instructions.content: I need a medical education-style rendering that precisely separates and highlights informations about the chest anatomy.

instructions.name: chest8
instructions.content: Photorealistic chest anatomy with full-opaque bone, red lungs, and semi-opaque skin.

instructions.name: abdomen1
instructions.content: A semi-opaque volume rendering of the liver to clearly visualize lesions in relation to surrounding tissues from the front angle.

instructions.name: abdomen2
instructions.content: A high-contrast volume rendering focusing on the appendix to assess for appendicitis, with clear visualization of inflammatory changes.

instructions.name: abdomen3
instructions.content: A high-contrast volume rendering of the intestines to assess for bowel obstruction, emphasizing fluid levels and distended segments.

instructions.name: abdomen4
instructions.content: A high-contrast volume rendering of the kidneys to visualize stones clearly, with emphasis on the renal pelvis and ureters.

instructions.name: abdomen5
instructions.content: High-contrast visualization to highlight inflammatory changes and fluid accumulation
